sentence.text: A risk score of 4, 4, 6, 6, 7, or 6 was assigned to diabetes, baseline estimated small GTPase mediated signal transduction AAAA 45 mL/min/1.73 m, hypertension, repeated contrast exposure, congestive heart failure, and persistent renal injury (defined as an elevation of serum creatinine ≥25% at 3 months), respectively.
